lines.text: [about why his lover won't tell his mother that he's dying of AIDS]
He'd rather not tell her than risk her not caring.
He's gonna die, you stupid bitch!
That's right. You're better'n me. I keep forgettin'.
Well, if wasn't was he is, he wouldn't be gonna die, would he? Would he! I hate it what he is! It turns my stomach!
Our sons are two of us.
